column2:
"Thanks! I'm really sorry for sending you to Volcanic Caverns
without realizing it..."

"You don't think this reward is too small,
do you?"

"But that's what makes you so great,
<%me>! Even if you did think
that, you wouldn't say anything, would you?"

"I hope you won't hold this against me.
Good-bye 'til next time!"

"ありがとーう！
何も知らずに火山洞窟なんかへ行かせて
本当にごめんなさい……"

"この報酬じゃ割に合わないとか
思ってない？"

"思ってても口に出さないのが
<%me>さんの
いいとこね！"
"これに懲りず、またよろしくね！"
